seller_description: Product Description: Help yourself to a bowl of comfort. Kraft Original Easy Mac Macaroni   Cheese Dinner Single Serve Packets are easy dinners that are ready in 3-1/2 minutes. Kids and adults love the rich taste and creamy texture of macaroni pasta with cheesy goodness. Easy macaroni and cheese packets include pasta and original flavor cheese sauce mix so you can make dorm food or a quick dinner for kids. With no artificial flavors, preservatives or dyes, an easy macaroni and cheese dinner is always great. Preparing microwave macaroni and cheese is a breeze. Just add water to the pasta in a bowl, microwave for 3-1/2 minutes and stir in the cheese mix. Our 38.7 ounce box includes 18 macaroni packets with 18 cheese packets, to make 18 single servings. Kraft Mac   Cheese inspires the positive power of comfort. Product details: Is Discontinued By Manufacturer : No. Product Dimensions : 6.63 x 9.88 x 5.44 inches; 2.43 Pounds. Item model number : 21000671496. UPC : 885720471787 021000671496 644220035703 013415759883 773821312613. Manufacturer : Kraft Heinz. ASIN : B005ECO3H0. Country of Origin : USA
review: It is very disappointed to receive a box of Kraft Macaroni   Cheese that is expired 6 months ago! Today is Feb 26, 2024 and the box shown best by Aug 29, 2023!
expected-output: Seller's Image vs. Buyer's Image: The seller's image showcases an 18-pack of Kraft Macaroni & Cheese Easy Mac, clearly labeled as such with vibrant packaging and no visible flaws. The buyer's image, however, reveals a box with an expiration date that has already passed, visible as "Best When Used By 29 AUG 2023." This discrepancy suggests an expired product was shipped. Seller's Description vs. Buyer's Review: The seller's description highlights Kraft Mac & Cheese's appeal, focusing on its convenience, flavor, and freshness, with no mention of quality issues or expired stock. The buyer's review, on the other hand, expresses dissatisfaction upon receiving a product past its expiration date by nearly six months, thus contradicting the expectation set by the seller's description. Alignment and Discrepancies: The main issue here is the expiration date discrepancy, which is critical for food products. The seller promises a quality product with no mention of potential issues with product freshness, while the buyer received a product that does not meet these standards. Conclusion: Buyer Satisfaction: Dissatisfied. Fault: The dissatisfaction arises due to the seller’s failure to deliver a product within the promised shelf life, which is a significant issue for consumable goods. This falls under the seller's responsibility as delivering expired food items can affect customer trust and product safety." The seller is at fault for sending an expired product, which contradicts the expectations of freshness and quality essential for consumable goods. This oversight led to buyer dissatisfaction and highlights a need for better inventory management to ensure products shipped are within their valid shelf life.
label: 0:Here seller is at fault
